Sentencas: The structural properties of polycrystalline yttria-stabilized zirconia (YSZ) have been studied using FT-Raman spectroscopy, X-ray diffraction, and X-ray photoelectron spectroscopy (XPS).
Titulo: Structural and compositional characterization of yttria-stabilized zirconia: Evidence of surface-stabilized, low-valence metal species

Sentencas: Yttria content was varied between 8 and 15% (by mole fraction) to determine compositional effects on YSZ phonon structure, lattice parameter, and oxidation state.
Titulo: Structural and compositional characterization of yttria-stabilized zirconia: Evidence of surface-stabilized, low-valence metal species

Sentencas: The dominant feature in the low-frequency Raman spectrum correlates quite closely with the material's sole (cubic) lattice parameter.
Titulo: Structural and compositional characterization of yttria-stabilized zirconia: Evidence of surface-stabilized, low-valence metal species

Sentencas: XPS measurements of typical YSZ samples show only a single species of both Y and Zr.
Titulo: Structural and compositional characterization of yttria-stabilized zirconia: Evidence of surface-stabilized, low-valence metal species

Sentencas: After exposing YSZ to a reducing environment (H-2) at elevated temperatures (1000 degrees C), however, the XPS spectra of YSZ show new features at lower binding energy for both Y and Zr.
Titulo: Structural and compositional characterization of yttria-stabilized zirconia: Evidence of surface-stabilized, low-valence metal species

Sentencas: Angle-resolved XPS measurements suggest that these reduced forms of Y and Zr exist only within the first few molecular layers of the sample.
Titulo: Structural and compositional characterization of yttria-stabilized zirconia: Evidence of surface-stabilized, low-valence metal species

Sentencas: This treatment does not effect the XRD pattern, nor does it change the low-frequency phonon structure observed in the Raman spectrum, although the Raman spectrum does experience similar to 50% reduction in overall signal intensity.
Titulo: Structural and compositional characterization of yttria-stabilized zirconia: Evidence of surface-stabilized, low-valence metal species

Sentencas: These disparities are reconciled with each other based on differences in each technique's sampling depth.
Titulo: Structural and compositional characterization of yttria-stabilized zirconia: Evidence of surface-stabilized, low-valence metal species

Sentencas: The impact that surface-reduced YSZ may have on the chemistry occurring within solid oxide fuel cells is discussed briefly.
Titulo: Structural and compositional characterization of yttria-stabilized zirconia: Evidence of surface-stabilized, low-valence metal species
